pkgmetadata.longdescription: Calculate Confidence Intervals // This calculates a variety of different CIs for proportions and difference of proportions that are commonly used in the pharmaceutical industry including Wald, Wilson, Clopper-Pearson, Agresti-Coull and Jeffreys for proprotions. And Miettinen-Nurminen (1985) doi:10.1002/sim.4780040211, Wald, Haldane, and Mee https://www.lexjansen.com/wuss/2016/127_Final_Paper_PDF.pdf for difference in proportions.
